122.5l-.1-.6V67.2c0-18.1-6.9-25.8-21.8-25.8h-1.8c-7.6 0-14 2.9-17.9 9.3l4.5 4.1s4.9-7.2 11.7-7c6 .1 10.8 2.1 10.8 14.5v14.3c-18.8 4.3-32.4 13.2-32.4 34.4 0 18.3 10.2 24.5 18.8 24.5 5 0 11.3-2.3 15.6-6.9 1.7 4.9 5.8 6.2 9.6 6.2s7.5-1.7 9-3.2v-6c-3.3 1.8-6 .8-6-3.1zm-14.6-26.1l-.1 20.2v6.2c-1.3 2.6-4.8 5.5-8.6 5.5-4.5 0-8.9-3.9-8.9-19 0-17.1 5.6-23.3 17.7-27.1l-.1 14.2z" fill="#FFFFFF">
      </path>
     </svg>
    </a>
   </h1>
   <a class="marquee-link" data-ga-call-to-action="media" data-ga-media-type="image" data-ga-ux-element="Spotlight" href="/lifestyle/a35822105/first-time-homebuyer-lessons/">
    <div class="marquee-media cover-story-marquee-media lazyload lazyload-in-view">
     <div class="cover-story-marquee-overlay">
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="marquee-inner">
     <div class="marquee-content">
      <div class="cover-story-details">
       <span class="cover-story-label">
        Take Notes.
       </span>
       <div class="cover-story-hed-container">
        <h2 class="cover-story-hed">
         What I Learned Buying My First Home
        </h2>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </a>
  </header>

122.5l-.1-.6V67.2c0-18.1-6.9-25.8-21.8-25.8h-1.8c-7.6 0-14 2.9-17.9 9.3l4.5 4.1s4.9-7.2 11.7-7c6 .1 10.8 2.1 10.8 14.5v14.3c-18.8 4.3-32.4 13.2-32.4 34.4 0 18.3 10.2 24.5 18.8 24.5 5 0 11.3-2.3 15.6-6.9 1.7 4.9 5.8 6.2 9.6 6.2s7.5-1.7 9-3.2v-6c-3.3 1.8-6 .8-6-3.1zm-14.6-26.1l-.1 20.2v6.2c-1.3 2.6-4.8 5.5-8.6 5.5-4.5 0-8.9-3.9-8.9-19 0-17.1 5.6-23.3 17.7-27.1l-.1 14.2z" fill="#FFFFFF">
       </path>
      </svg>
     </a>
     <a class="top-nav-subscribe" href="https://join.housebeautiful.com/pubs/HR/HBU/HBU1_Plans.jsp?cds_page_id=255641&amp;cds_mag_code=HBU&amp;cds_tracking_code=topnav">
      Subscribe
     </a>

        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <span>
          Next Wave 2021
         </span>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="bac51892-b058-49e8-b570-92f523695473" data-vars-block-slot="4" data-vars-block-type="4 Across Block">

          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Next Wave 2021" data-vars-position="1" href="/lifestyle/a35526595/whitney-jones-next-wave/">
            Whitney Jones Finds Color Inspiration in Nature
           </a>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item nina-nash-long-next-wave image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Next Wave 2021" data-vars-position="2" href="/lifestyle/a35526508/nina-nash-long-next-wave/">
           <img alt="nina nash long" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/next-wave7-1614617325.jpg?crop=0.5xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/next-wave7-1614617325.jpg?crop=0.5xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/next-wave7-1614617325.jpg?crop=0.5xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/next-wave7-1614617325.jpg?crop=0.5xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/next-wave7-1614617325.jpg?crop=0.5xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Next Wave 2021" data-vars-position="2" href="/lifestyle/a35526508/nina-nash-long-next-wave/">

      <div class="feed-block-column feed-block-column-middle">
       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-column-heading">
         <a href="/design-inspiration/">
          Design
         </a>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-column-content" data-vars-block-curation="Section" data-vars-block-id="9c27375f-f892-4205-804f-bdb480f08ff5" data-vars-block-slot="6" data-vars-block-type="3 Column Block">
        <div class="custom-item mina-starsiak-hawk-karen-laine-good-bones-reno-house-for-sale image-left">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Design" data-vars-position="1" href="/design-inspiration/real-estate/a35874095/mina-starsiak-hawk-karen-laine-good-bones-reno-house-for-sale/">

		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],

			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
